import turtle
import datetime as dt

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("white")

t1 = turtle.Turtle()
t1.pensize(3)
t1.color('black')
t1.penup()

t1.goto(-50, 0)
t1.pendown()

for i in range(2):
	t1.forward(250)
	t1.left(90)
	t1.forward(70)
	t1.left(90)

t1.hideturtle()

t = turtle.Turtle()
t.goto(0,10)

hr = dt.datetime.now().hour
mn = dt.datetime.now().minute
sec = dt.datetime.now().second

while True:
    t.hideturtle()
    t.clear()
    t.write(str(hr).zfill(2)+":"
    +str(mn).zfill(2)+":"
    +str(sec).zfill(2),
    font =("Arial Narrow", 35, "bold"))

    sec = dt.datetime.now().second
    mn = dt.datetime.now().minute
    hr = dt.datetime.now().hour
